mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, email, pwd, nickname, name, phone_number, profile, rdate, auth, rating) values((select ifnull(max(member_id), 0)+1 from member b), #{email}, #{pwd}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{phone_number}, null, now(), 3, 0)
mapper.update: update member set pwd = #{pwd} where email = #{email}
